title: How to copy the same list to another entity
body:
I need to copy a existent list to another entities, but when the entity framework save only one entity persit the list.

var myList = GetList();

var newList = myEntities.Select(x =>
{
   var entity = x.GetEntity();

   entity.List = myList.ToList();

   return entity;
}).ToList()

Repository.SaveMany(newList);
Repository.SaveChanges();
